name: UIInterpolatingMotionEffect.EffectType
desc: The axis to use when interpolating values.

items.name: case tiltAlongHorizontalAxis
items.desc: Interpolate values along the horizontal axis, which involves the device facing left or right of the user’s viewpoint.

items.name: case tiltAlongVerticalAxis
items.desc: Interpolate values along the vertical axis, which involves the device facing above or below the user’s viewpoint.
